data.Name: Asset Owners Disclosure Project
data.Tagline: AODP, a ShareAction project, assesses and engages the world’s largest institutional investors on their approach to responsible investment.
data.About: AODP, a ShareAction project, assesses and engages the world’s largest institutional investors on their approach to responsible investment. Our mission is to leverage the global financial system to tackle key global issues, with a focus on climate change, human rights, and biodiversity.
